name: TinyHotel
description:
TinyHotel is a simple management game, You will have to build a small hotel and manage check-ins but beware of making mistakes this game does not provide corrections, the rooms you build will remain and you will not be able to modify them.

Challenge yourself

Graphical requirements The game has been programmed for a resolution of 1920x1080

If you want you can play at this LINK without installing
